name: 吉莉恩·格拉斯科
name_full: 吉莉恩·格拉斯科 Gillian Glasco

last_movies.title: 杰西卡·琼斯 第一季

introduction: Gillian Glasco is a native of North Little Rock, Arkansas. She received her B.F.A in Acting from Ithaca College, Ithaca, New York. She has performed in a variety of theatrical, film, and television productions. Most recently she has guest-starred on Bull, FBI: Most Wanted, Blue Bloods, and City on a Hill. Her recent accolades include being the featured actress in the short film "Moths and Butterflies" which was awarded best short at ABFF. "Moths and Butterflies" streamed on HBO platforms for the following two years. Her writing was featured in the short film "Tough" which was showcased in several film festivals across the country including Frameline Film Festival and Urbanworld Film Festival. If stuck on a desert island all I would need is cheese, Prince, and bell hooks.
